channel.title: Need Team of Programmers and (see topic for details)
channel.description:
Hello everyone! I am going to create an RSPS and need assistance. I will need a team of programmers I have a source and client that we will be working on (not my work). I could do it myself but it will take to long and I am prepared to offer 10% of all earnings made from but not limited to Donations and Website advertisements. Aswell as a co-owner position on the finished server. I will need approximately 5 people to work on this and you will need to meet the following requirements:
1) RSPS knowledge 2) Java knowledge 3) A computer (obviously) 4) And a desire to create an RSPS
Thats about all it isnt much, I hope to get a bunch of reply's. One thing I would also like to mention that you do not need skype and we will not be meeting in person because of what country you might live in or your age as there is no age requirment. If your wondering why this is in this section I am going to give a download link for source and client when its done I will be posting updates on the correct section not here. If this is in the wrong section please let me know im new here thanks!
If you are interested please email me at rsommer@sympatico.ca or post a reply to this post!
Thanks for your time!
Ryan

item.title: Need Team of Programmers and (see topic for details)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:23, topic:431453”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=534131.msg3905176#msg3905176 date=1328151045]

It prob would help if you posted this in development teams and not in server downloads

I personally think this fits more as a download.

And no ones going to join unless you can do something to… start off with some features of your own, post, etc.
[/quote]

I need the following things done:

  1. Change home to varrock square
  2. Change welcome message to “Welcome to EDXscape (owner Ryan)”
  3. Create a price list (I dont know were your going to find this but they will be the same as RS)
  4. I would like the server to have high xp rates if you can do anything about that that would be great!
    Also if you dont live in the EST zone then use this: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html

When your finished (deadline tommorow at 3pm est) give me an email and we will go from there.

Do you really think he is able to do something or even wanting to? ^[/quote]
he can if he goes by the leechers code of life:

When times are rough, go to the help section

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“ryansiphonehelp, post:20, topic:431453”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=534131.msg3905064#msg3905064 date=1328146322]

add me and send me a messege my email is nicksheffield18@hotmail.com

Download source and client here: http://www.mediafire.com/?xe9zja4t5f83cy9
666 cache here: http://www.mediafire.com/?q58ba87auz86o88

I need the following things done:

  1. Change home to varrock square
  2. Change welcome message to “Welcome to EDXscape (owner Ryan)”
  3. Create a price list (I dont know were your going to find this but they will be the same as RS)
  4. I would like the server to have high xp rates if you can do anything about that that would be great!
    Also if you dont live in the EST zone then use this: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html

When your finished (deadline tommorow at 3pm est) give me an email and we will go from there.

Ryan

Lmao you are letting some one else doing the work, even you could do that yourself (except if you are mentally retarded) in 5 minutes.
And you still keep fucking in the wrong section
You look for a team but you give orders
and you send them the source which gives now one any reason to send you back the edited version.

Sir, gtfo of this forums and go back playing with your lego will ya

Im not sure were you live but im sure there is some sort of Psychologist near you, I recommend one!

Ryan

I guess u should go back to school instead, since you are
to lazy to do something yourself
to dumb to realize the stupidity of your posts
not able to read
posting your name under everything, while now one cares and if they did they could read it in your nickname (so short: stupidity again)
doesn’t know the meaning of the word “team”
doesn’t see the difference between “development teams” and “server downloads”
[/quote]

Happy now???[/quote]
yes, well about the right section part yes,
not about your stupidity

Sorry I dont have skype, and yes im 100% serious if you could email me and ill tell you what you can start working on that would be great! Once again sorry for the inconvenience (I did say in the thread about the skype by the way) but I would love your help so if you can your hired!

My email adress is: rsommer@sympatico.ca

item.title: Need Team of Programmers and (see topic for details)
item.dc:creator: @ryansiphonehelp ryansiphonehelp
item.description:
@ryansiphonehelp wrote:

Hello everyone!
I am going to create an RSPS and need assistance. I will need a team of programmers I have a source and client that we will be working on (not my work). I could do it myself but it will take to long and I am prepared to offer 10% of all earnings made from but not limited to Donations and Website advertisements. Aswell as a co-owner position on the finished server. I will need approximately 5 people to work on this and you will need to meet the following requirements:

  1. RSPS knowledge
  2. Java knowledge
  3. A computer (obviously)
  4. And a desire to create an RSPS

Thats about all it isnt much, I hope to get a bunch of reply’s. One thing I would also like to mention that you do not need skype and we will not be meeting in person because of what country you might live in or your age as there is no age requirment. If your wondering why this is in this section I am going to give a download link for source and client when its done I will be posting updates on the correct section not here. If this is in the wrong section please let me know im new here thanks!

If you are interested please email me at rsommer@sympatico.ca or post a reply to this post!

Thanks for your time!

Ryan

Read full topic
